kv7.1:5.1: Natthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi saṅgahitāti?
kv7.1:5.3: Nanu atthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi gaṇanaṃ gacchanti uddesaṃ gacchanti pariyāpannāti?
kv7.1:5.5: Hañci atthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi gaṇanaṃ gacchanti uddesaṃ gacchanti pariyāpannā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:6.3: Hañci cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:6.13: Hañci kāyāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:7.11: Hañci phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:8.3: Hañci sukhā vedanā vedanākkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:8.9: Hañci adukkhamasukhā vedanā vedanākkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:9.3: Hañci cakkhusamphassajā saññā saññākkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:9.9: Hañci manosamphassajā saññā saññākkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:10.5: Hañci manosamphassajā cetanā saṅkhārakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:11.5: Hañci manoviññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:12.1: ☒ Yathā dāmena vā yottena vā dve balībaddā saṅgahitā, sikkāya piṇḍapāto saṅgahito, sā gaddulena saṅgahito;
kv7.1:12.2: evameva te dhammā tehi dhammehi saṅgahitāti?
kv7.1:12.3: Hañci dāmena vā yottena vā dve balībaddā saṅgahitā, sikkāya piṇḍapāto saṅgahito, sā gaddulena saṅgahito, tena vata re vattabbe—
